name: blistered
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If skin is blistered, it has one or more painful swellings that contain liquid, caused usually by continuous rubbing or by burning: Despite badly blistered feet, he finished the race. I played that bass guitar until my thumb was blistered and bleeding.
having hollow rounded swellings on the surface: Roast the peppers until the skins are blistered. We sanded down the old blistered paint.
More examplesFewer examplesMy toes were blistered from all the dancing.Blistered skin usually heals on its own.Mansell won the race, on a set of well-worn and blistered tyres.
